# planaflorData

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of planaflorData is to provide tools to facilitate data wrangling and visualization of the PlanaFlor project.

## Installation

You can install the released version of planaflorData from [GITHUB](https://github.com/planaflor/planaflorTools) with:

``` r
if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes)
remotes::install_github("planaflor/planaflorTools")
```

```{r}
library(planaflorTools)
get_planaflor_data_dir()
```
